resources.string: For Complaints and Queries, Please Contact Us at

The EZ Home Services App optimizes home maintenance by offering specialized services in electrical, car mechanic, AC, and plumbing. 
 Users access certified professionals for tasks such as wiring repairs, new fixture installations, routine car maintenance, diagnostics, and repairs. 
 The app ensures transparency with real-time scheduling, clear pricing, and efficient problem-solving 
 Mechanic profiles, GPS tracking, and digital service records enhance the overall user experience.
